body.p: A USB connector with a battery icon ( an icon of a dry-cell cylindrical battery ) supports the always-on function. The PC can supply power to a USB device connected to this type of connector even when the PC is powered off, in sleep mode, or in hibernation mode.
The always-on function can be turned on and off in:

ul.li: The PC's firmware setup utility, or
Lenovo Vantage or Lenovo PC Manager
